body_html:
I'm pretty sure this PR doesn't work and will have runtime failures (even if you run unit tests).

I dont see how the torch.backends.cudnn.deterministic flag actually propagates into Convolution.cpp
See how the cudnn.benchmark flag propagates through, for example see https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/9be8d0a9d2492732218a497a0fff2b41255c82c5/torch/nn/functional.py
body_text:

I dont see how the torch.backends.cudnn.deterministic flag actually propagates into Convolution.cpp
See how the cudnn.benchmark flag propagates through, for example see https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/9be8d0a9d2492732218a497a0fff2b41255c82c5/torch/nn/functional.py
body:
I'm pretty sure this PR doesn't work and will have runtime failures (even if you run unit tests).

I dont see how the torch.backends.cudnn.deterministic flag actually propagates into Convolution.cpp
See how the cudnn.benchmark flag propagates through, for example see https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/9be8d0a9d2492732218a497a0fff2b41255c82c5/torch/nn/functional.py
